text: Céline Dion has grossed a total of $1,400,056,687 and played to a total of more than 15,190,000 spectators in more than 2000 shows throughout her career. ==Concert tours== {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !Title !Recording(s) !Format(s) !No. of Shows !Total Attendance !Total Gross |- |1983–1984 |Les chemins de ma maison | | |40 |40,000 |$200,000 |- |1985 |Céline Dion en concert |Céline Dion en concert |LP |42 |45,000 |$400,000 |- |1988 |Tournée Incognito | | |75 |150,000 |$1,500,000 |- |1990–1991 |Unison Tour |Unison |VHS |75 |150,000 |$2,000,000 |- |1992–1993 |Celine Dion in Concert | | |74 |500,000 |$12,000,000 |- |1994–1995 |The Colour of My Love Tour |À l'Olympia |CD/Cassette |98 |1,300,000 |$33,000,000 |- |rowspan="1"|1995–1996 |rowspan="1"|D'eux Tour |Live à Paris (video) Live à Paris (album) |VHS/DVD/CD/Cassette |47 |500,000 |$13,000,000 |- |- |1996–1997 |Falling Into You: Around the World |Live in Memphis |VHS |148 |2,220,000 |$80,000,000 |- |rowspan="1"|1998–1999 |rowspan="1"|Let's Talk About Love World Tour |Au cœur du stade (video) Au cœur du stade (album) |VHS/DVD/CD/Cassette |97 |2,300,000 |$133,000,000 |- |- |2008–2009 |Taking Chances World Tour |Celine: Through the Eyes of the World Taking Chances World Tour: The Concert |DVD/CD/Blu-ray |132 |2,300,000 |$280,000,000 |- |2013 |Tournée Européenne 2013 |Céline une seule fois / Live 2013 |CD |10 |143,400 |$25,500,000 |- |2016 |Summer Tour 2016 | | |28 |347,332 |$56,000,000 |- |2017 |Celine Dion Live | | |25 |458,000 |$63,300,000 |- |2018 |Celine Dion Live 2018 |Live 2018 in Japan |TV broadcast |22 |259,443 |$57,386,611 |- |2019–2020 |Courage World Tour | | |TBD |TBD |TBD |- !
